content.description:
This area is actually across the road from Murrin Park but the topo in the quickdraw publications website lists this as being in Murrin Park, so here it is. It's a shaded area that gets some afternoon sun at the top. It can feel very crowded because even though there are 36 routes on it so far, 3 or 4 routes often share the same start and branch out from there. Routes are fairly steep.

Route developer: Chris Small, area announced 2019. 60m rope is sufficient for most of the routes, but some do require a 70m rope or lowering/rappelling to intermediate stations to get down.
